attributes.action: make St. George's Day a national holiday in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England lags far behind the rest of Europe in the number of holidays we get. A national holiday on St George's Day would be a great opportunity for all the English (regardless of colour, religion or sexuality) to recognise what binds us together - instead of concentrating on our differences.

Everything from cricket to curry could be celebrated on our national day.

Northern Ireland already has a holiday on St. Patrick's Day, the Scottish Parliament has introduced a voluntary holiday on St. Andrew's Day and the Welsh Assembly agree that St. David's Day should be a holiday. Soon St Georges Day will be the only one without an official holiday.

Support Saint George and give everybody in England a day when they can be united.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
